## 2022-12-27

### Changed

- **Home Assistant Container LXC** 
  - Add an option to use Fuse Overlayfs (ZFS) (Advanced)

- **Docker LXC** 
  - Add an option to use Fuse Overlayfs (ZFS) (Advanced)
  - If the LXC is created Privileged, the script will automatically set up USB passthrough.
